definitions.definition: A note formerly used in music, one half the length of a large, twice that of a breve.
A long integer variable, twice the size of an int, two or four times the size of a short, and half of a long long.
An entity with a long position in an asset.
definitions.example: Every uptick made the longs cheer.

definitions.definition: The long summer vacation at the English universities.
To take a long position in.
To await, aspire, desire greatly (something to occur or to be true)
definitions.example: She longed for him to come back.

definitions.definition: To be appropriate to, to pertain or belong to.
Long trousers/pants, as opposed to shorts.
